author: costin
msg: Added line mapping generation.
Also, few more indentation fixes ( better looking page ).
The comment will be generated only based on an Option. The default is
false ( debugers using the "old" style can easily turn the option on).
The new mapping is much simpler then parsing a java file.

author: costin
msg: 2 more hooks: generation of file and line maps.
This is a very simple structure that maps line in the java file to
locations in the jsp file. The ServletWriter can mantain and generate
the map itself, but we want generators to be able to add their own special
mappings.

author: costin
msg: Small ( hacky ) fix: use the resources from runtime, StringManager
is in the common class loader and it expects all resources to be in
the same loader.
There are few other limitations in StringManager, we should fix it - but
for now it works well enough.

author: costin
msg: Small fix, the "hook" target will do a quick replace ( no more editing )
If you want to run with jasper34, just run "ant hook"

author: costin
msg: Use tomcat_util from jakarta-tomcat.
The stuff could be moved in a common place, if that place would exist
( moving it to jakarta-commons may be a good idea, but I don't have
the resources right now ).
